title: Therapeutic Effects and Mechanisms of Faecalibacterium Prausnitzii in a Rat Model of Liver Cirrhosis.
abstract: Liver cirrhosis development is often accompanied by dysbiosis of the intestinal flora. As an important component of the human intestinal microflora,  A rat model of liver cirrhosis was generated via treatment with CCL4 and gavage with
